title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:23 <Ruudjah2> has joined #xwiki  
00:25 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
00:48 <Ruudjah2> has quit  
02:36 <jvelociter> has quit  
03:16 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
03:35 <jvelociter> has quit  
04:13 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
04:14 <@sdumitriu> Ah, finally  
05:34 <sdumitriu> has quit  
05:37 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
05:56 <sdumitriu> has quit  
07:42 <tekzilla> has quit  
07:44 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
08:22 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:02 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
12:38 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
12:39 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
14:56 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
15:35 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* rb97aa19 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7105: Source reference should be set in XDOM before transformations execute - http://git.io/TmtMJQ  
15:55 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r97f1160 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-display/src/main/java/org/xwiki/display/internal/DocumentContentDisplayer.java :  
15:55 <CIA-102> XWIKI-7105: Source reference should be set in XDOM before transformations execute  
15:55 <CIA-102> \* Fix checkstyle error - http://git.io/K2IyZw  
16:03 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* rdc95b51 / xwiki-rendering-transformations/xwiki-rendering-transformation-icon/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/internal/transformation/icon/IconTransformation.java : Added @Override - http://git.io/PsroTQ  
16:03 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r4d30663 / (2 files): Added @Override - http://git.io/SWmqQA  
16:03 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r114cec2 / (13 files in 6 dirs): XRENDERING-154: Create a Transformation to check broken external links - http://git.io/NpvHyQ  
16:13 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* rdbac260 / xwiki-rendering-syntaxes/xwiki-rendering-syntax-xhtml/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/internal/renderer/xhtml/link/AbstractXHTMLLinkTypeRenderer.java : XRENDERING-155: It's not possible to set a custom "class" parameter for a freestanding link - http://git.io/Dic-EQ  
16:16 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
16:20 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r348b563 / (11 files in 2 dirs): Renamed tests so that they are named in a more logical manner - http://git.io/17M4wA  
16:21 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
17:14 <mflorea> has quit  
17:26 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
17:30 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
17:46 <jvelociter> has quit  
18:17 <CIA-102> Sergiu Dumitriu master \* r38153fd / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/resources/js/xwiki/table/livetable.js :  
18:17 <CIA-102> XWIKI-4570: Disable previous/next arrows in livetables when there are no previous or following pages  
18:17 <CIA-102> Bulletproofing - http://git.io/7jw-Dw  
18:19 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Fixed the livetable bug  
18:19 <vmassol> thanks sdumitriu  
18:24 <vmassol> hey you're cheating !  
18:24 <vmassol> you didn't do much on the build AFAICS, I'm pretty sure i spent even more time than you did (by a  huge factor)...  
18:25 <vmassol> ;)  
18:26 <vmassol> note that the platform build is failing for some unknown reason to me, looks like a jenkins bug  
18:26 <@sdumitriu> Hey, I did monitor it  
18:26 <vmassol> well it's been failing during the whole week  
18:27 <vmassol> so you didn't do a good job  
18:27 <@sdumitriu> I bound the ui-tests to agent-2 since agent-5 where it ran most of the times triggered the XRANDR missing failure  
18:27 <vmassol> (caused by your bug causing the ui tests failiure)  
18:27 <@sdumitriu> And while I was waiting to see the new results I got kicked out of the internet  
18:33 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Looks like a jenkins bug to me too  
18:34 <vmassol> maybe we could remove the issue by removing the // build for platform  
18:34 <vmassol> (for now)  
18:34 <@sdumitriu> Ye  
18:34 <@sdumitriu> s  
18:35 <@sdumitriu> It's weird that the build seems to be finished, but when opening the build status I see it still running  
18:35 <@sdumitriu> I'll check on a5 to see if it is executing or not  
18:36 <@sdumitriu> No, not running  
18:37 <@sdumitriu> Fails on a6 as well  
18:37 <@sdumitriu> Are you disabling || ?  
18:38 <vmassol> nope  
18:38 <vmassol> otp  
18:38 <@sdumitriu> I'll do it then  
18:41 <@sdumitriu> Disabled ||, build seems to work now  
18:51 <vmassol> back, cool then  
19:11 <CIA-102> Vincent Massol master \* r822502c / xwiki-rendering-transformations/xwiki-rendering-transformation-linkchecker/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rendering/internal/transformation/linkchecker/DefaultHTTPChecker.java :  
19:12 <CIA-102> XRENDERING-154: Create a Transformation to check broken external links  
19:12 <CIA-102> \* Try to remove cookie warnings in logs and put back default auto retry. - http://git.io/wzpQAw  
19:18 <vmassol> restarting xwiki.org  
19:22 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
21:11 <[1]jer> has joined #xwiki  
21:14 <+sburjan`> wow, a lot of broken links  
21:15 <vmassol> only 4xx but yes a few  
21:18 <+sburjan`> so basically this page lists all external links ?  
21:18 <vmassol> ye  
21:18 <vmassol> p  
21:21 <vmassol> broken ones: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Admin/ExternalLinkStatus?broken=1  
21:21 <vmassol> (or unknown, 0 means it took too much time to answer)  
21:21 <vmassol> (or an error happened during the transport)  
21:38 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
22:08 <vmassol> sdumitriu: I've created a team for Jeremie Lagarde on https://github.com/organizations/xwiki-contrib/teams/104639  
22:08 <vmassol> should we create a repo for him or should he do it himself?  
22:08 <@sdumitriu> We should create it  
22:08 <@sdumitriu> Since creating a repo requires admin rights  
22:09 <vmassol> any naming rule?  
22:10 <@sdumitriu> Let me check what I did so far, but I think extension-mantis should be the one  
22:10 <vmassol> mantis? mantis-extension?  
22:10 <vmassol> hmm  
22:10 <vmassol> ok  
22:10 <@sdumitriu> For most of the repos I used <type>-<name>  
22:10 <vmassol> yes but....  
22:11 <vmassol> we need to decide if we call something macro-\* or extension-\*  
22:11 <@sdumitriu> Now, what remains to see is if it can be further refined from the generic "extension"  
22:11 <vmassol> it's a bit more complex though since an extension can contribute several things: several macros + a script service + etc  
22:11 <vmassol> so personally I like extension-\* for all extensions  
22:12 <@sdumitriu> It's a script service  
22:12 <vmassol> yes for now  
22:12 <@sdumitriu> So yes, +1 for extension  
22:12 <vmassol> a macro will be added in the futuer I'm sure  
22:12 <vmassol> ok creating  
22:12 <@sdumitriu> extension-mantis OK with you as well?  
22:13 <@sdumitriu> Don't forget to set up email notification + disable wiki/issues  
22:13 <[1]jer> hi all  
22:13 <vmassol> hi [1]jer  
22:13 <vmassol> give me 1 more minute and hten check your mail ;)  
22:13 <[1]jer> ok  
22:15 <vmassol> [1]jer: done  
22:15 <vmassol> btw if you could change your nick that would be great, a real name is encouraged here…. also typing [ is harder on my mac with French keyboard ;)  
22:19 <[1]jer> is now known as <jlagarde>  
22:19 <vmassol> yeah :)  
22:43 <jlagarde> thx for the github repo,  I pushed my code  
22:44 <vmassol> yep seen it (we get notifcations emails on the notifications list), cool  
22:44 <vmassol> bed time for me, getting up early tomorrow (6AM ouch…) ;) nn  
22:45 <vmassol> has quit  
22:55 <abusenius> has quit  
22:59 <jlagarde> has quit
